name: Mage's Initiation: Reign of the Elements
description: D'arc is a sixteen-year-old Mage to be. A sinister plot threatens his initiation and risks plunging the land of Iginor into conflict and chaos. Choose from four classes and train in the Elemental arts. Master a unique range of spells to solve puzzles, battle monsters, and confront the ultimate evil.
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows XP or higher Processor: Pentium or higher Memory: 64 MB RAM Graphics: 640x400, 32-bit color, 700 Mhz DirectX: Version 8.0 Storage: 2 GB available space Sound Card: All DirectX-compatible sound cards
recommended_requirements: OS: Windows XP or higher Processor: Pentium or higher Memory: 128 MB RAM Graphics: 1280x800, 32-bit color, 1200 Mhz DirectX: Version 8.0 Storage: 2 GB available space Sound Card: All DirectX-compatible sound cards
